ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.helpers
Class ElasticSearchQueries

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.helpers.ElasticSearchQueries

public class ElasticSearchQueries
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class for ElasticSearch. Contains various queries and builders for queries to be used when interacting with ElasticSearch.

Author:
Artem Herasymchuk
